therian.operation

Class Transform<SOURCE,TARGET,RESULT,TARGET_POSITION extends Position<TARGET>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • therian.Operation<RESULT>
      • therian.operation.Transform<SOURCE,TARGET,RESULT,TARGET_POSITION>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Add, AddAll, Convert, Copy

    public abstract class Transform<SOURCE,TARGET,RESULT,TARGET_POSITION extends Position<TARGET>>
extends Operation<RESULT>
    Abstract transform operation. A "transformer" is an operator over a transform operation. Defining "Transformer" in terms of our object model would constrict the behavior of transformer implementations in detrimental ways.

      • getTargetType

        @BindTypeVariable
public org.apache.commons.lang3.reflect.Typed<TARGET> getTargetType()
        Get the narrowest possible target type. If this Transform operation maps its TARGET_POSITION type parameter as some Readable then this will be deduced from target position type/value, else the target position will be returned.
        Returns:
        Typed
